data.title: Doug Turner Plumbing CO.
data.meta_description: Become an MVP Member to reap all the benefits of our distinguished multi-value plan at Doug Turner Plumbing CO. today! Click here.
data.text:
If a real emergency situation presented itself at your home, would you know how and where to cut off the main water to your residence? Most people would not! Our service professionals will place emergency cutoff tags on your incoming water service valve and on your water heater.

With your MVP Membership, you automatically become eligible for MVP Value Pricing, an approximate savings of 10% on the total cost (labor and material) of all your plumbing needs for the entire length of your plan.

If problems are noticed during routine service calls, we will immediately bring them to your attention and furnish exact pricing information in writing (at MVP Value Pricing) on all recommended repairs and, with your approval, complete them at your convenience.

Because everyone likes a sale, our MVP members receive different special promotions. Special discounts and new product trials will be available only to a select group: our MVP Members! The current special promotion will be emailed to you and posted on our website for your convenience if you do not have access to a computer. Or an email address, you are always welcome to call our office and inquire about the current specials.

Your MVP Membership also qualifies you for Priority Preferred Service status, ensuring you prioritize scheduling seven days a week, 24 hours a day for all your plumbing needs. When you need a repair, we will put you in front of all new customers.

Every MVP Membership includes a $20 savings certificate for you to share with a neighbor, friend, or family. If you’re comfortable recommending our service team, share this savings certificate with them. We’d appreciate it, and we think they would appreciate your thoughtful gesture.

Contact our office at (281) 201-6065 for additional details and to become a member!

VALID MONDAY-FRIDAY, 8 AM - 5 PM

Valid Monday-Friday, 8 AM - 5 PM for any plumbing service over $100. It is not valid with other offers, discounts, or prior sales. A coupon is required at the time of service.

VALID MONDAY-FRIDAY, 8 AM - 5 PM

Valid Monday-Friday, 8 AM - 5 PM for any plumbing service over $100. It is not valid with other offers, discounts, or prior sales. A coupon is required at the time of service.

Secure Your Home with MPV Membership: Enjoy Exclusive Benefits & Emergency Safeguards Today!
